Name: DEEP SPACE | Space-Platformer
About the game: What is DEEP SPACE ? DEEP SPACE - a new game from BUG-Studio representing hardcore-endless Sci-fi platformer, which generates new levels on the go! Each new level will not be like the past! What's the game about? You are one of the members of the DeTeam team, which controls the safety of scientific stations, which are various experiments of scientists. If there was a leak of the virus and everyone at the station got infected, it's your time! Grab your gun, jump into the spaceship and go to a new sweep! Be careful... The DeTeam team is top secret! If you die, no one will remember you... Features: - Fully generated levels, traps, monsters! It will be fun, interesting and challenging! - Ability to buy and pump guns and improvements! - Dynamic and challenging gameplay! Are you sure you can? - Dynamic soundtrack by HateBit! Turn it up!
